subject: Physical Fitness
title: The Neuromuscular Junction
description: A 60-second lesson on The Neuromuscular Junction.

hook.text: Between your brain's command and your muscle's action, there's a tiny gap. Nothing touches.

buildup.text: The neuromuscular junction is where nerve meets muscle. A chemical signal leaps across the gap.

discovery.text: Acetylcholine floods the gap, triggering electrical signals that race along the muscle fiber.

twist.text: This handoff takes under a millisecond. You decide to move and the signal arrives almost instantly.

climax.text: Diseases like myasthenia gravis attack this junction. When it fails, muscles ignore the brain.

punchline.text: A tiny chemical gap stands between thought and action.

quiz.question: What chemical crosses the neuromuscular junction?
